snippet: Senator Rob Portman’s new support for gay marriage has intensified and quickened debate over the issue in Ohio, his home state.
abstract: Reversal by Republican Senator Rob Portman of Ohio on long-held opposition to same-sex marriage has intensified and quickened debate over issue in his home state; Portman says it was spurred by son's disclosure that he is gay; shift is welcomed by gay advocates, but social conservatives denounce Portman and vow to block his re-election.
lead_paragraph: Senator Rob Portman’s new support for gay marriage has intensified and quickened debate over the issue in Ohio, his home state.

headline.seo: Senator Portman Sorts Ohio Fallout After Marriage Shift
headline.main: Doubts and Downloads in Ohio After Portman’s Shift on Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Doubts and Downloads in Ohio After Portman’s Shift on Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
